ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Quests Expanded - The Generator
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Sarg Bjornson, Taranchuk, Bread mo
ModMetaData.description:
In a world on the brink, one invention could change everything. Vanilla Quests Expanded: Generator invites you to uncover the secrets of the ARC — a powerful, ancient generator created by a brilliant, mysterious inventor.
Embark on a perilous quest to unlock its full potential, upgrade it with nuclear, geothermal, or chemfuel power, and shape its evolution with procedurally generated visuals. Will the ARC be your colony’s salvation — or its undoing?
Vanilla Quests Expanded: Generator — adapt, survive, and honor the inventor’s legacy. The power is yours to claim. Are you ready?
Vanilla Quests Expanded is a series of mods featuring complex quest chains that give strong and impactful rewards upon completion. If you liked it and you'd like to see more, make sure to leave us a comment!
